document_data.name: Morlen Askalan
document_data.mainbody: '''Morlen Askalan''' was a [[highknight]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: During the fugitive [[Elminster Aumar]]'s attempt to sneak into [[Castle Obarskyr]] of [[Suzail]] in the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, he was one of the highknights set upon him. When the ghost of Princess [[Alusair Obarskyr]] came to his aid, Morlen Askalan did not accept her commands, so she walked through him, subjecting him to her ghostly influence. The man lost consciousness on the spot.
